publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4547 Donald Gorrie: Play Opportunities in Schools—That the Parliament regrets the omission of play from the consultation on the proposed Schools (Nutrition and Health Promotion) Bill and believes that the Scottish Executive should develop a policy in which schools encourage play opportunities, review the form and use of school playgrounds and explain the importance of play as part of the school day to pupils, staff and the local community.
S2M-4547 Play Opportunities in Schools (lodged on 13 June 2006) Alex Neil*

S2M-4547 Play Opportunities in Schools (lodged on 13 June 2006) Shiona Baird*, Chris Ballance*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Tommy Sheridan*, Euan Robson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Robin Harper*, Rob Gibson*

S2M-4547 Donald Gorrie: Play Opportunities in Schools—That the Parliament regrets the omission of play from the consultation on the proposed Schools (Nutrition and Health Promotion) Bill and believes that the Scottish Executive should develop a policy in which schools encourage play opportunities, review the form and use of school playgrounds and explain the importance of play as part of the school day to pupils, staff and the local community.
